thread.section_title: Carid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Carid | www.carid.com
thread.title: Kutina Akpalou

author: Kutina Akpalou
title: Kutina Akpalou
text: Interacting with CarID customer service was one of the most favorable experiences I have encountered till date. The representative was extremely kind and exhibited knowledge in handling my specific request. The care and concern shown by the representative went above and beyond my expectations. CarID customer service should be duplicated throughout the United States. I would truly recommend this company for all your vehicle part and accessory needs. Awesome job!
